tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensitive_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    credit_card_number VARCHAR(16),
    cardholder_name VARCHAR(100),
    expiration_date DATE,
    cvv VARCHAR(3)
);

CREATE TABLE personal_details (
    user_id INT,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    social_security_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    credit_card_number VARCHAR(16) ENCRYPTED,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    payment_method VARCHAR(50) ENCRYPTED,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE addresses (
    address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    street_address VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50),
    zip_code VARCHAR(10) ENCRYPTED,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE CreditCardInformation (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL,
    card_holder_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,
    cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PersonalDetails (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE EncryptedCreditCardInformation (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    encrypted_card_number BYTEA NOT NULL,
    encrypted_card_holder_name BYTEA NOT NULL,
    encrypted_expiration_date BYTEA NOT NULL,
    encrypted_cvv BYTEA NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE EncryptedPersonalDetails (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    encrypted_full_name BYTEA NOT NULL,
    encrypted_date_of_birth BYTEA NOT NULL,
    encrypted_address BYTEA NOT NULL,
    encrypted_phone_number BYTEA NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE credit_cards (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  card_number STRING,
  card_holder_name STRING,
  expiration_date DATE,
  cvv INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE personal_details (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name STRING,
  last_name STRING,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  address STRING
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username STRING,
  password STRING,
  email STRING,
  phone_number STRING
);
